name: Alfonso el Oso
description:
[Game made for the first Gamejam URV at Reus. This was our first game as a team and, for some of us, this was our first game at all.]

Alfonso is a dictator looking forward to enjoy the summer. Having the largest springboard of the country has it's issues, for that Alfonso starts his journey to the pool at winter.

Help Alfonso through an epic journey to avoid getting sweaty balls.

Controls: ↑ to jump  ↓ to duck

If you finish the game or lose all hearts, reload the page to restart the game.
